data.eml:eml: Revision of the Early Ordovician (late Tremadocian, Stairsian) cheirurid trilobite Tesselacauda Ross, with species from the Great Basin, western USA

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Adrain, Jonathan M., Karim, Talia S. (2019): Revision of the Early Ordovician (late Tremadocian, Stairsian) cheirurid trilobite Tesselacauda Ross, with species from the Great Basin, western USA. Zootaxa 4661 (2): 201-255, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4661.2.1
